When the scientists discovered how to send messages across time, we rejoiced. However, the government told us that this was dangerous and took away the technology from the public. We supported the government.
We had misjudged their powers. Just think what would happen if you could know the future, know what people will think, know the election results. The government started controlling our life, our thoughts. Nothing we did would go unnoticed. We started living in a monarchy.
These had to stop. We built our own time messaging device. However, because of limited resources, it could only send one word at a time.
